citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, two water receptacles the outdoor housed animals had continuous or overnight access to prior to
their departure that morning for an exhibition event to return by 11 AM same day, had greenish-brown organic sediment
and plant material covering the bottom of the receptacles. There was also debris floating on top of the water. One
receptacle was for 2 pigs of mixed age and sex and one receptacle was for 6 goats, 2 zebu and 2 sheep of mixed age
and sex. The facility representative stated the water receptacles had not been cleaned for the past couple of days. Failure
to provide access to potable water in clean water receptacles for animals may result in their illness or injury. Exhibitors
shall keep all water receptacles clean and sanitary.
Correct from this date forward of 11 July 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.130 
   
Watering. 
At time of inspection, two water receptacles the outdoor housed animals had continuous or overnight access to prior to 
their departure that morning for an exhibition event to return by 11 AM same day, had greenish-brown organic sediment 
and plant material covering the bottom of the receptacles. There was also debris floating on top of the water. One 
receptacle was for 2 pigs of mixed age and sex and one receptacle was for 6 goats, 2 zebu and 2 sheep of mixed age 
and sex. The facility representative stated the water receptacles had not been cleaned for the past couple of days. Failure 
to provide access to potable water in clean water receptacles for animals may result in their illness or injury. Exhibitors 
shall keep all water receptacles clean and sanitary. 
 
Correct from this date forward of 11 July 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
